content: i love funny hats on babies i included 2 sizes jay is wearing the bigger size he is 10 months old the smaller size would be for smaller babies or babies with smaller heads have fun with marling two colours together i can t wait to see your combinations some of the best ones are usually the unexpected ones yarn one strand of hedgehog fibres merino aran in typewriter 1 skein held together with one strand of hedgehog fibres sock yarn in bandit 1 skein
